an6.29:7.1: sivathikāya → sīvathikāya (sya-all, pts1ed) | chaṭṭitaṃ → chaḍḍitaṃ (bj, sya-all, pts1ed)
an6.29:8.1: Seyyathāpi vā pana → seyyathā vā pana (sya-all) | siṅgālehi → sigālehi (bj, pts1ed)
an6.29:9.4: disāvidisāvikkhittāni → disāvidisāsu vikkhittāni (bj) | kaṭiṭṭhikaṃ → kaṭaṭṭhikaṃ (bj) | phāsukaṭṭhikaṃ aññena piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhikaṃ aññena khandhaṭṭhikaṃ aññena gīvaṭṭhikaṃ aññena hanukaṭṭhikaṃ aññena dantakaṭṭhikaṃ aññena sīsakaṭāhaṃ → piṭṭhikaṇḍakaṃ aññena sīsakaṭāhaṃ (si, pts1ed) | piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhikaṃ aññena sīsakaṭāhaṃ (sya-all, km) | saṅkhavaṇṇappaṭibhāgāni → saṅkhavaṇṇūpanibhāni (bj, sya-all, pts1ed) | puñjakitāni → puñjakatāni (pts1ed)
